Page 2
Mrs. Betty McKenzie
I made my suggestions for the format of each speech in a previous
letter. In addition to the speeches, I think a brief message from the
NAIB president should be included explaining that the PORTFOLIO was
prepared by the public relations committee as a member service to serve
as an aid in preparing speeches, etc..In the explanation we might
add that some of the speeches are a bit dated and the information will
have to eeatinne to be up-dated to remain accurate.
I m enclosing, too, a directory which Elmer Busier sent for our
possible use. To prepare a booklet like this for available NA1B speakers
would be a tremendous job...I could supply possibilities from Detroit end
other cities in Michigan but certainly lack the information about the
entire U. S. If you know of speakers across the States and would like to
prepare a list, by States, feel free. But I doubt if it would have enough
use to warrant the time invested in its preparation.
I'm anxious to see how both the PR KIT and SPEAKERS1 PORTFOLIO look
with all the materials in them. They are certainly a valuable member
service and I hop the members' response will justify the many hours we
have spent preparing them. We are certainly grateful for your time end
effort, Betty. Keither the KIT nor the PORTFOLIO would be possible
without your skills.
With all good wishes.
MCida
Marion Cornell, Manager
Educational Television
cc: Harold Hill
